name: Take Car
description:
Welcome to Take Car! Where you can.. take cars... by pulling them. Get it?

You are a cube named Carl. While doing janitorial gigs you end up getting trapped in a toy car facility. Use your pull abilities to press buttons, move things out of the way, and more, probably.

This game is designed around the keyboard. I tried to add controller support, but I can't test it so it's not recommended.

Erm..  Have fun, and make sure to take care of yourself! Or something. Also, report any bugs to me, please.

(also I know it shows the godot output thing but I cannot fix that)
